text.question: Я желтый, и я фрукт. Обезьяны любят меня. Что я такое?
Я красный, и я фрукт. Я расту на дереве. Что я такое?
Я белый, и я холодный. Ты можешь пить меня. Что я такое?
Я маленький, и я зеленый. Я живу в воде. Что я такое?
Я большой, и я серый. У меня длинный нос. Что я такое?
Я kруглый, и я оранжевый. Я расту в земле. Что я такое?
Я маленький, и я желтый. Я могу летать. Что я такое?
Я большой, и я коричневый. Я живу в лесу. Что я такое?
Я маленький, и я черный. Я живу ночью. Что я такое?
Я большой, и я синий. Я живу в океане. Что я такое?
The more you take, the more you leave behind. What am I?
I’m not alive, but I can grow. I don’t have lungs, but I need air. What am I?
I have keys but no locks. I have space but no room. What am I?
I’m tall when I’m young, and I’m short when I’m old. What am I?
What has to be broken before you can use it?
What has a heart that doesn’t beat?
What has hands but can’t clap?
I’m full of holes but still hold water. What am I?
I can fly without wings. I can cry without eyes. What am I?
I’m always in front of you but can’t be seen. What am I?
What has a face but no head?
What has a neck but no head?
What has to be broken before you can eat it?
What has a thumb and four fingers but isn’t alive?
What has a ring but no finger?
What has a bed but never sleeps?
What has a head and a tail but no body?
What has a bark but no bite?
What has a tongue but can’t talk?
What has a face but can’t smile?
What has a bottom at the top?
What has a mouth but can’t eat?
What has a key but can’t open locks?
What has a bed but never lies down?
What has a foot but no legs?
What has a head but never weeps?
What has a tail but no body?
What has a spine but no bones?
What has a face but no eyes?
What has a heart but no organs?
What has a bank but no money?
What has a trunk but no limbs?
What has a wave but no water?
What has a crown but no head?
What has a needle but can’t sew?
What has a shell but isn’t a nut?
What has a page but no words?
What has a frame but no pictures?
What has a button but no shirt?
What has a screen but no movies?
What has a handle but no door?
What has a blade but can’t cut?
What has a thread but no needle?
What has a root but no leaves?
What has a bridge but no water?
What has a stage but no actors?
What has a lock but no key?
What has a belt but no pants?
What has a horn but doesn’t honk?
I am not alive, but I can die. What am I?
I am always hungry, I must always be fed. The finger I touch will soon turn red. What am I?
I have cities, but no houses. I have forests, but no trees. I have rivers, but no water. What am I?
I am taken from a mine and shut up in a wooden case, from which I am never released, and yet I am used by almost every person. What am I?
I am always in front of you but can never be seen. What am I?
I am not alive, but I can grow. I don’t have lungs, but I need air. What am I?
I am full of holes but still hold water. What am I?
I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have no body, but I come alive with the wind. What am I?
I have keys but open no locks. I have space but no room. You can enter, but you can’t go outside. What am I?
I am light as a feather, yet no one can hold me for long. What am I?
I am always in front of you but can’t be seen. What am I?
